member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.AbmlDocument
member.summary: Represents a complete ABML document.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.AbmlDocument.Version
member.summary: The ABML version (e.g., "2.0").

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.AbmlDocument.Metadata
member.summary: Document metadata (id, type, description, etc.).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.AbmlDocument.Imports
member.summary: Import definitions for schemas and other documents.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.AbmlDocument.Context
member.summary: Context definition with variables, requirements, and services.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.AbmlDocument.Goals
member.summary: GOAP goal definitions for behavior planning. Maps goal name to its definition with priority and conditions.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.AbmlDocument.Options
member.summary: Options block for actor self-description. Enables Event Brain queries via /actor/query-options endpoint.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.AbmlDocument.Flows
member.summary: Named flows containing action sequences.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.AbmlDocument.OnError
member.summary: Document-level error handler flow name. Called when an error is not handled by action-level or flow-level handlers.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.DocumentMetadata
member.summary: Document metadata.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.DocumentMetadata.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for this document.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.DocumentMetadata.Type
member.summary: Document type: behavior, dialogue, cutscene, dialplan, or timeline.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.DocumentMetadata.Description
member.summary: Human-readable description.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.DocumentMetadata.Tags
member.summary: Categorization tags.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.DocumentMetadata.Deterministic
member.summary: Hint for runtime that execution is deterministic.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.ImportDefinition
member.summary: Import definition for schemas or other ABML documents.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.ImportDefinition.Schema
member.summary: Schema file path (for type imports).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.ImportDefinition.Types
member.summary: Types to import from schema.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.ImportDefinition.File
member.summary: ABML document file path (for document imports).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.ImportDefinition.As
member.summary: Namespace alias for imported document.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.ContextDefinition
member.summary: Context definition with variables, requirements, and services.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.ContextDefinition.Variables
member.summary: Variable definitions.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.ContextDefinition.Requirements
member.summary: Requirements that must be met to execute this document.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.ContextDefinition.Services
member.summary: Service dependencies.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.VariableDefinition
member.summary: Variable definition within context.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.VariableDefinition.Type
member.summary: Variable type (e.g., "int", "string", "bool").

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.VariableDefinition.Default
member.summary: Default value for the variable.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.VariableDefinition.Source
member.summary: Source expression for bound variables.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.VariableDefinition.Computed
member.summary: Computed expression for derived variables.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.ServiceDependency
member.summary: Service dependency declaration.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.ServiceDependency.Name
member.summary: Service name.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.ServiceDependency.Required
member.summary: Whether the service is required.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Flow
member.summary: Represents a named flow containing action sequences.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Flow.Name
member.summary: Flow name.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Flow.Triggers
member.summary: Triggers that can activate this flow.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Flow.Goap
member.summary: GOAP metadata for this flow (preconditions, effects, cost). When present, this flow can be used as a GOAP action.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Flow.Actions
member.summary: Actions to execute in this flow.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Flow.OnError
member.summary: Error handler actions for this flow. When an error occurs, these actions execute with _error variable set.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.FlowTrigger
member.summary: Flow trigger definition.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.FlowTrigger.Event
member.summary: Event pattern to trigger on.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.FlowTrigger.Condition
member.summary: Condition expression that must be true.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.FlowTrigger.TimeRange
member.summary: Time range for triggering (e.g., "08:00-17:00").

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.FlowTrigger.Schedule
member.summary: Cron-style schedule.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.GoapGoalDefinition
member.summary: GOAP goal definition from ABML goals: section. Goals define desired world state conditions with priorities.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.GoapGoalDefinition.Priority
member.summary: Goal priority (higher = more important). Default is 50 for normal priority.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.GoapGoalDefinition.Conditions
member.summary: Conditions that define goal satisfaction. Keys are world state property names, values are literal conditions. Examples: "hunger" -> "<= 0.3", "gold" -> ">= 50"

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.OptionsDefinition
member.summary: Options definition for actor self-description. Maps option types (combat, dialogue, etc.) to their option definitions.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.OptionsDefinition.OptionsByType
member.summary: Options grouped by type (combat, dialogue, social, exploration, or custom).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.OptionDefinition
member.summary: Definition of a single option within an options block. Expressions are evaluated at runtime to produce ActorOption values.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.OptionDefinition.ActionId
member.summary: Unique identifier for this action within the option type.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.OptionDefinition.Preference
member.summary: Preference expression (0-1). Can be a literal float or an expression like "${combat.style == 'aggressive' ? 0.9 : 0.6}".

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.OptionDefinition.Risk
member.summary: Risk expression (0-1). Can be a literal float or an expression. Optional.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.OptionDefinition.Available
member.summary: Availability expression. Can be a literal bool or an expression like "${equipment.has_sword}".

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.OptionDefinition.Requirements
member.summary: Human-readable requirements for this option.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.OptionDefinition.CooldownMs
member.summary: Cooldown in milliseconds. Can be a literal int or an expression. Optional.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.OptionDefinition.Tags
member.summary: Tags for categorization (e.g., "melee", "offensive", "loud").

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.GoapFlowMetadata
member.summary: GOAP metadata from flow goap: block. Describes a flow as a GOAP action with preconditions, effects, and cost.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.GoapFlowMetadata.Preconditions
member.summary: Preconditions that must be satisfied to execute this action. Keys are world state property names, values are literal conditions. Examples: "hunger" -> "> 0.6", "gold" -> ">= 5"

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.GoapFlowMetadata.Effects
member.summary: Effects applied to world state when action completes. Values can be absolute ("0.5", "tavern") or delta ("-0.8", "+5"). Examples: "hunger" -> "-0.8", "location" -> "tavern"

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.GoapFlowMetadata.Cost
member.summary: Action cost for A* planning (lower = preferred). Default is 1.0 for unit cost.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Actions.ActionNode
member.summary: Base type for all action nodes in an ABML document.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Actions.IHasOnError
member.summary: Interface for actions that support action-level error handling.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Actions.IHasOnError.OnError
member.summary: Actions to execute if this action fails.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Actions.CondAction
member.summary: Conditional branching action (if/else-if/else).
member.param: Actions to execute if no condition matches.

member.summary: Ordered list of condition branches.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Actions.CondAction.ElseBranch
member.summary: Actions to execute if no condition matches.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Actions.CondBranch
member.summary: A single branch in a conditional action.
member.param: Actions to execute if condition is true.

member.summary: A single branch in a conditional action.
member.param: Actions to execute if condition is true.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Actions.CondBranch.When
member.summary: Condition expression string.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Actions.CondBranch.Then
member.summary: Actions to execute if condition is true.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Actions.ForEachAction
member.summary: Iteration over a collection.

Actions to execute for each item.

member.summary: Iteration over a collection.

Actions to execute for each item.

member.summary: Expression string evaluating to a collection.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Actions.ForEachAction.Do

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Actions.RepeatAction

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Actions.ContinuationPointAction
member.summary: Continuation point for streaming composition. Allows extensions to attach during execution.

remarks.para: When execution reaches a continuation point: 1. If an extension is attached, control transfers to the extension 2. Otherwise, waits up to Timeout for an extension to arrive 3. If timeout expires, executes DefaultFlow
This enables streaming composition: game server receives complete cinematic, starts executing, and can optionally receive extensions mid-execution.

member.param: Unique name for this continuation point.
Maximum time to wait for extension (e.g., "2s", "500ms").
Flow to execute if no extension arrives.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Actions.ContinuationPointAction.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Continuation point for streaming composition. Allows extensions to attach during execution.

remarks.para: When execution reaches a continuation point: 1. If an extension is attached, control transfers to the extension 2. Otherwise, waits up to Timeout for an extension to arrive 3. If timeout expires, executes DefaultFlow
This enables streaming composition: game server receives complete cinematic, starts executing, and can optionally receive extensions mid-execution.

member.param: Unique name for this continuation point.
Maximum time to wait for extension (e.g., "2s", "500ms").
Flow to execute if no extension arrives.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Actions.ContinuationPointAction.Name
member.summary: Unique name for this continuation point.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Actions.ContinuationPointAction.Timeout
member.summary: Maximum time to wait for extension (e.g., "2s", "500ms").

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Documents.Actions.ContinuationPointAction.DefaultFlow
member.summary: Flow to execute if no extension arrives.

member.summary: Urgency expression (0.0-1.0). Higher urgency wins.
